programme.title: Remarkable Places to Eat S2
programme.desc: In the second series of Remarkable Places To Eat, Britain's best loved foodies take host Fred Sirieix to experience their favourite restaurants and explore what goes into making them so special. Series highlights include a visit to Marrakesh with Andi Oliver, exploring the delights of Vienna with Rachel Khoo and a road trip around Yorkshire with Nadiya Hussain.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: With a fresh approach to tackling the issues of the day, Talking Point investigates a current issue or event, offering different perspectives to local stories and reveals how it all affects you.

programme.title: On The Red Dot
programme.desc: I Am a Hawker: Bib Gourmand Edition follows Singapore's most celebrated hawkers—those who've earned and fight to keep their Michelin Bib Gourmand. Each episode spotlights one hawker's journey through tradition, innovation, and the relentless pressure of holding that title, revealing the personal stakes, sacrifices, and resilience behind every award-winning dish.

programme.title: Arts 21
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Everything you've ever wanted to know about Europe - from traditions and habits to culture shocks and record breakers.

programme.title: Modern Marvels: Machines
programme.desc: Adam learns the true meaning of "heavy" when he visits legendary heavy equipment manufacturer: John Deere. Big machines do big jobs and he gets an inside look at how top brands like SANY and JCB are pushing the envelope on what these machines can do. Then, we'll take a nostalgic look at where many fell in love with heavy machinery, TONKA TRUCKS! Plus, we get the inside scoop on massive mining machines that can skim mere inches or scour literal truckloads of material at a time.

programme.title: Cooking Up A Fortune
programme.desc: Brand new series where the UK's most passionate cooks get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to launch their own food brand to the British public. Cooking Up a Fortune sees amateur foodies, who dream of escaping the rat race and cooking for a living, create and sell their dishes to hundreds of real diners in a purpose-built food arena. Each week the winning kitchen gets to launch their idea for a food business to paying customers in one of Europe's busiest food markets.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off Series 11: An Extra Slice
programme.desc: Each week, BAFTA-winning comedian Jo Brand shines a light on all the goings on from inside the tent. With the help of a celebrity panel, Jo serves up an extra helping of unseen moments, as well as devouring the tasty offerings brought in by the studio audience. Jo and her panel are also joined by the latest baker to leave to get all the gossip from their time on the show. And Tom Allen appears as a regular guest, reviewing audience members' bakes.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S3
programme.desc: Hiccup and Sneeze are two young forest monsters that snuck in one day out of the rain. They are a brother and sister, who liked the place so much they decided to stay. (Monsters sometimes do that and it's not even considered rude - but that's just monsters). Anyway, they're all living together in Bibi's magical house even though sometimes Hiccup and Sneeze don't really understand that being a monster and being a human are two very different things...

programme.title: Club M.A.G.I.C
programme.desc: Today on CLUB M.A.G.I.C, the Positive Agents seem to have lost their senses! Didi has lost her sense of smell due to a blocked nose, Ling has water in her ears so she cannot hear very well and Sham has to wear an eye patch to protect his injured eye. Miss P is the only one whose senses seem to be quite safe! She gives her agents a task and that is to discover how important our senses are to us. LETTER OF THE DAY is 'c' and the words featured are cucumber, clown and crab.

programme.title: 123 Number Squad S1
programme.desc: The Number Squad came to help Prince Aamil when things descend into chaos when Aamil adds too many new things in group of 10 to make the marketplace more exciting.The animals accidentally broke Farmer Haywire's new jam making machine while trying to get his attention. The Number Squad uses their math wit to ensure the different sized jars are filled with the correct amount of jam.

programme.desc: Brand new series where the UK's most passionate cooks get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to launch their own food brand to the British public. Cooking Up a Fortune sees amateur foodies, who dream of escaping the rat race and cooking for a living, create and sell their dishes to hundreds of real diners in a purpose-built food arena. Each week the winning kitchen gets to launch their idea for a food business to paying customers in one of Europe's busiest food markets.

programme.title: 长风渡
programme.desc: 扬州布商之女柳玉茹自小遭遇生母病重、庶母不慈、父亲不重视的困境，她不得已谨小慎微，做了十五年模范闺秀。不料，对婚姻抱有憧憬的她却被被家里安排嫁给了名满扬州的纨绔顾九思。顾九思也误会柳玉茹是因为攀附权贵才嫁给他，对其嗤之以鼻。柳玉茹幡然醒悟，不能将命运系之婚姻，系之他人，决定跟随顾母学习经商之道，真实、独立、精彩地实现自我价值。经过刻苦努力，柳玉茹顺利通过了顾母的考验，生意上逐渐得心应手，更是在此过程中改变了对顾九思的看法，发现其至纯至善、炽热真诚的一面，两个人的心也越靠越近。然而此时，扬州节度使王善泉凶狠毒辣、倒行逆施，导致百姓流离失所，顾家不得已举家逃亡，原本奢靡无度的顾九思看着万千流民，一夜之间长大。为结束混乱局面，让百姓安居，顾九思从捕快做起，官至户部尚书，与志同道合者扫除积弊，轻税轻徭。柳玉茹则内修善堂、外建商交，使得物资繁盛、百姓安康，两人共同谱写了一段盛世佳话。.

programme.title: 星期二特写 ： 大士变幻时

programme.title: 但愿人长久
programme.desc: 1953年那个初冬的早晨，台湾眷村里，邓家第四个孩子，“丫头”邓丽君（陈妍希饰）诞生。丫头在歌唱方面的才华幼时便已显现，无奈父亲邓枢（侯勇饰）坚决反对。邓枢退伍，开始了市场摆摊生涯。丫头不解父亲心中的抑郁和乡愁，但她成了父亲卖包子馒头的小帮手。小学毕业后，丫头未能考上初中。但已透过电台歌唱比赛获胜成为歌唱节目的固定班底。邓枢在市场摆摊与流氓发生冲突，被殴打成伤，还闹上了官司。深夜里，夫妇俩感慨这一切只因没有固定店面所致。丫头听在耳里，心疼父母，成为签约歌手并预支薪水，用这笔钱替父亲顶下了店面，邓枢知道后感动不已。丫头终于顺利登台，获得许多好评。.

programme.desc: Mt Ngauruhoe既是毛利人圣山，也是一部魔幻电影的取景地，今集港女野人誓要登上这座「末日火山」！旅程挑战全长约20公里、海拔高逾1800米的单日行山径，此行变数难以预计，四位主持严阵以待决向登山教练求救！由国家公园内的行山径起步，预计需步行十小时，出发前突击各人背包，各自带了什么装备？出发路段平坦易行，沿途可见麦芦卡树小花，四人终近距离看到「末日火山」！真正的考验「魔鬼阶梯」亦在眼前…….

programme.title: 长风渡
programme.desc: 扬州布商之女柳玉茹自小遭遇生母病重、庶母不慈、父亲不重视的困境，她不得已谨小慎微，做了十五年模范闺秀。不料，对婚姻抱有憧憬的她却被被家里安排嫁给了名满扬州的纨绔顾九思。顾九思也误会柳玉茹是因为攀附权贵才嫁给他，对其嗤之以鼻。柳玉茹幡然醒悟，不能将命运系之婚姻，系之他人，决定跟随顾母学习经商之道，真实、独立、精彩地实现自我价值。经过刻苦努力，柳玉茹顺利通过了顾母的考验，生意上逐渐得心应手，更是在此过程中改变了对顾九思的看法，发现其至纯至善、炽热真诚的一面，两个人的心也越靠越近。然而此时，扬州节度使王善泉凶狠毒辣、倒行逆施，导致百姓流离失所，顾家不得已举家逃亡，原本奢靡无度的顾九思看着万千流民，一夜之间长大。为结束混乱局面，让百姓安居，顾九思从捕快做起，官至户部尚书，与志同道合者扫除积弊，轻税轻徭。柳玉茹则内修善堂、外建商交，使得物资繁盛、百姓安康，两人共同谱写了一段盛世佳话。.

programme.title: 詹姆士出走料理 V
